query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upgrade_audit_trail (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  upgradeId INT NOT NULL,
  actionType ENUM('rollback', 'correction') NOT NULL,
  performedBy INT NOT NULL,
  performedByName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  reason TEXT,
  
  originalBadgeName VARCHAR(100),
  originalFromLevel ENUM('none', 'bronze', 'silver', 'gold'),
  originalToLevel ENUM('bronze', 'silver', 'gold'),
  originalStatName VARCHAR(50),
  originalStatIncrease INT,
  originalNewStatValue INT,
  originalMetadata TEXT,
  
  correctedBadgeName VARCHAR(100),
  correctedFromLevel ENUM('none', 'bronze', 'silver', 'gold'),
  correctedToLevel ENUM('bronze', 'silver', 'gold'),
  correctedStatName VARCHAR(50),
  correctedStatIncrease INT,
  correctedNewStatValue INT,
  correctedMetadata TEXT,
  
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  
  INDEX idx_upgradeId (upgradeId),
  INDEX idx_actionType (actionType),
  INDEX idx_performedBy (performedBy)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS upgrade_audit_trail (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  upgradeId INT NOT NULL,
  actionType ENUM('rollback', 'correction') NOT NULL,
  performedBy INT NOT NULL,
  performedByName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  reason TEXT,
  
  originalBadgeName VARCHAR(100),
  originalFromLevel ENUM('none', 'bronze', 'silver', 'gold'),
  originalToLevel ENUM('bronze', 'silver', 'gold'),
  originalStatName VARCHAR(50),
  originalStatIncrease INT,
  originalNewStatValue INT,
  originalMetadata TEXT,
  
  correctedBadgeName VARCHAR(100),
  correctedFromLevel ENUM('none', 'bronze', 'silver', 'gold'),
  correctedToLevel ENUM('bronze', 'silver', 'gold'),
  correctedStatName VARCHAR(50),
  correctedStatIncrease INT,
  correctedNewStatValue INT,
  correctedMetadata TEXT,
  
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  
  INDEX idx_upgradeId (upgradeId),
  INDEX idx_actionType (actionType),
  INDEX idx_performedBy (performedBy)
)
